description: Number of primitive (aperiodic, or Lyndon) 3-asymmetric rhythm cycles: ones having no nontrivial shift automorphism. 3-asymmetric rhythm cycles (A115115): binary necklaces of length 3n subject to the restriction that for any k if the k-th bead is of color 1 then the (k+n)-th and (k+2n)-th beads (modulo 3n) are of color 0.
